languages.text: {n}Одним движением выхватив оружие, вы освобождаете мир от ксеноскверны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Одним движением выхватив оружие, вы освобождаете мир от скверны ксеномашины.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одним движением выхватив оружие, вы освобождаете мир от ксеноскверны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You whip out your weapon in one swift movement, and rid the world of the corrupting xeno abomination.{/n}
{n}You whip out your weapon in one swift movement, and rid the world of the corrupting xeno abomination.{/n}
{n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno abomination.{/n}
{n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno abomination.{/n}
{n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}
{n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬の動きであなたは武器を構え、堕落をもたらす異種族の忌まわしき存在をこの惑星から葬り去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬の動きであなたは武器を構え、堕落をもたらす異種族の忌まわしき存在をこの惑星から葬り去った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einer blitzschnellen Bewegung ziehst du deine Waffe und befreist die Welt von der gefährlichen Xeno-Abscheulichkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer blitzschnellen Bewegung ziehst du deine Waffe und befreist die Welt von der gefährlichen Xeno-Abscheulichkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'un geste rapide, vous dégainez votre arme et débarrassez le monde de la xéno-abomination corruptrice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste rapide, vous dégainez votre arme et débarrassez le monde de la xéno-abomination corruptrice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un único movimiento fluido, desenfundas tu arma y liberas al mundo de la corruptora abominación xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un único movimiento fluido, desenfundas tu arma y liberas al mundo de la corruptora abominación xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你迅速抽出武器，摧毁了这台邪恶的异形造物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你迅速抽出武器，摧毁了这台邪恶的异形造物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çevik bir hamleyle silahına davranıyorsun ve bu yozlaşmış, menfur zeno icadını yeryüzü suretinden siliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In one swift movement, you draw your weapon and rid the world of the corrupting xeno-abomination.{/n}
